input.sentences: our wood shop class held a demonstration in the gymnasium .
we showed our skills off to everyone who attended .
people even offered to buy our furniture .
no one offered to buy this ugly bird house .
here 's our teacher in action . he can make anything out of wood .
output.sentences: Some friend and I decided to attend a woodworking class.
We worked together to create frames for wooden boxes.
The wooden boxes turned out well.
Some of the students had a tough time with their creations.
We all had a wonderful time and learned a great deal.
